text: lekin ghar se door baithe mohan kumaar ko jab isakee khabar milee to vah pareshaan ho gaya
use ekaek vishvaas nahin aaya tha ki dev kee shaadee itanee jaldee ekaek kaise tay ho gaee
vah maan kaise gaya aur maan bhee gaya to ladakee kaise pasand kee
kaheen usakee sthiti ko chhipaaya to nahin gaya lekin mohan ko ramesh par bharosa tha
tabhee aarmee eksachenj se usane ramesh se phon par baat karane ke lie kol buk karava dee
sikandraabaad se dillee kol milane mein chaar ghante lag gae
aur is beech karnal mohan kumaar lagaataar sharaab pee raha tha
maanasik tanaav ko door karane ka yahee saadhan use achchha lagata tha
usakee patnee nimmee in ulajhanon ko door nahin kar paatee thee
ulte kaee baar banatee huee baat ko aur bigaad kar use adhik khushee milatee thee
aisee kaee auraten bhee hotee hain jo har achchheeburee baat ko sirph bigaadane kee drshti se dekhatee hain
koee unake maadhyam se hanse taaki unakee taareeph ho yah unhen achchha lagata hai
lekin koee apanee khushee mein khush hokar hanse aur unhen batae ki use phalaan khushee milee hai aisa unhen achchha nahin lagata
oopar se hansatee hain lekin man hee man unhen achchha nahin lagata
aisa hee hua tha use dev kee shaadee kee khabar sunakar
use maaloom bhee na tha aur baat pakkee ho gaee
tabhee to taar padhate hee mohan kumaar ko bolee  lo jee shaadee pakkee ho gaee aur hamen pata bhee nahin chala
sab kaam poora karake hamen bata rahe hain
achchha hota shaadee ke baad hee khabar kar dete
aur taar usakee taraph badhaate hue bolee  kal kuchh ho gaya tab pareshaanee hamen sahanee padegee
usane buraasa munh banaaya saath hee
mohan kumaar tab kuchh bola nahin
taar dekhane laga
lekin usamen kuchh adhik nahin likha tha keval chand shabd the  dev kee shaadee nau pharavaree kee tay huee hai
dillee pahunche
ramesh
mohan kumaar ne padha aur taar rakh dee
kuchh pal vah sochata raha phir uthakar usane saamane ke raik se sharaab kee botal nikaal lee aur nimmee se gilaas laane ko kaha
tab kichan kee taraph jaate hue nimmee ne kaha  bas aapako to yahee tareeka aata hai sochane ka
pareshaanee ho tab bhee khushee ho tab bhee
phir kuchh ruk kar bolee  kuchh kahoge nahin
kahane ko kya hai mere paas
mohan khoya hua kuchh sochate hue bola
usaka man dillee mein pahunch chuka tha
dev ke man ko tatol raha tha
kyon nahin hai kuchh sabase pahale tumhen chaahie seedheseedhe ramesh se poochho ki usane ladakee vaalon ko kya kuchh bataaya hai phir svayan ladakee vaalon se baat karo
kal kaheen kuchh ho gaya to naak apanee hee kategee
nimmee ne spasht roop se kaha
yahee karoonga pahale ramesh se baat ho jae
mohan ko bhee nimmee kee baat uchit lagee thee
tabhee teleephon kee ghantee bajee
mohan ne vaheen baithe phon utha liya
sar
dillee nambar holding sar
oparetar kee aavaaz thee
oke
hailo
oparetar ne laeen kleeyar kar dee
doosaree taraph ramesh hee tha
hailo
bhaee saahab
gud eevaning
gud eevaning
ramesh
kaise ho bhaee
main theek hoon aap sunaeee  phir kuchh ruk kar aavaaz aaee
meree taar mil gaee thee
haan mil gaee thee
dev khush hai kya
bahut khush hai
suno ramesh
tumane dev ke vishay mein pooree jaanakaaree dee hai na ladakee vaalon ko
ramesh ne palabhar ka maun rakha
mohan ne dubaara kaha  hailo
meree baat sun rahe ho na
haan bhaee saahab sab kuchh bataaya hai aur mainne doktar gupta se bhee baat kee thee
usane bhee dev ka chekap karake yahee kaha hai ab koee pareshaanee nahin hai
shaadee ke baare mein usee se poochh kar dev ne haan kee hai
phir theek hai
mujhe isee baat kee chinta thee
ladakee kaisee hai  mohan ne raahat kee saans lee
achchhee hai
eme beeed hai
saintral skool mein teechar hai
aur phemilee
padhe likhe log hain
deharaadoon mein apana ghar hai
pita ritaayard hain
ladakee ghar mein doosare nambar par hai
chalo achchhee baat hai
dev ko meree or se badhaee dena
mohan sab vistaar se sunakar khush ho gaya
aap aa kab rahe ho  udhar se ramesh ne poochha
koshish karoonga chhuttee jaldee mile
nahin to shaadee se ekado din pahale jaroor pahunch jaoonga
chalie achchhee baat hai
bhaabhee kaisee hain  ramesh ko nimmee ka dhyaan ho aaya
kaheen bhool jaata to usakee shaamat aa jaatee
achchhee hai
lo baat kar lo
phir mohan ne nimmee ko phon pakada diya
nimmee ramesh se baat karane lagee
baaten hotee raheen
kabhee maalatee ne baat kee kabhee amit ne aur maan ne bhee nimmee se baat kee
dev ghar mein nahin tha
pandrah minat se oopar silasila chalata raha
sarakaaree phon ka sahee istemaal ho raha tha
aur yah to ab sabako apane adhikaar kshetr kee baat lagatee hai
sabhee karate hain phir kaahe kee chinta
phon par baat karake mohan kumaar ko tasallee ho gayee thee
ab vah khushee se pee raha tha
raat kaaphee ho rahee thee
nimmee khaana lagaane ko utaavalee ho rahee thee
usane mohan se doteen baar aagrah kiya uthane ko aur mohan ne uthateuthate ek paig aur banaaya aur badhakar nimmee ke honthon par laga diya aur bola usase
chiryas phor da hailth oph dev
aur nimmee ne bhee mohan kee khushee mein ek chhota sa ghoont bhar kar saath diya
dev kee baaraat mein naachane vaale teen log the pramod amit va ramesh kumaar
mohan va baaboojee baind ke saathasaath chal rahe the
dev kee bahan neeta bhaabhee maalatee va nimmee maan aur komal sabhee dev ke saath kaar mein baithe the
yahee the baaraatee
aur koee bhee nahin
haan dekhane vaale bhee yahee soch rahe the ki baaraat mein baind vaalon kee sankhya adhik hai
lekin in teenon ne raunak laga rakhee thee
hotal se ghar tak ka raasta lagabhag aadha kilomeetar ka tha aur ye sabhee saare raaste naachate chal rahe the
mauhalle ke bachcheboodhe sabhee khusheekhushee is baaraat ko dekh rahe the
aisa lagata tha ki jaise dekhane vaale sabhee baaraatee hon
iseelie sadak bhee bhareebharee dikhaee pad rahee thee
svaagat dvaar ke paas pahunch kar pramod va amit kaaphee der tak naachate rahe
vadhoo paksh vaale sabhee unhen dekh rahe the
sabhee ke cheharon se prasannata jhalak rahee thee
amit naachate hue bhee apanee aankhon ko idharudhar dauda kar kuchh dekhane kee cheshta kar raha tha
sabhee ke cheharon mein vah koee ek chehara khojana chaah raha tha
shaayad priya ka lekin priya veena ke paas thee
ghar mein
use kya maaloom tha ki koee usaka divaana ban gaya hai
vah to apanee deedee kee shaadee mein itanee ramee huee thee ki amit ya koee aur use paas se aakar bhee ghoorane lagata to bhee jaan na paatee
aur amit to chor nigaahon se abhee use dhoondh hee raha tha
baind ruka to pandit jee ne mantrochchaar se baaraat ka svaagat kiya
phir pannaalaal ne aage badhakar dev ke pita ke gale mein maala daal kar unaka svaagat kiya
tatpachaat sabhee ka svaagat kiya gaya
pandaal ghar ke bheetar hee lagaaya gaya tha
ghar kaaphee khula tha aur lagabhag sau vyakti aasaanee se ek saath khade ho sakate the
baaraat to thodee thee hee aur pannaalaal ne bhee isee baat ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue bahut kam vyaktiyon ko aamantrit kiya tha
saath hee kaaphee log to vaapis ja chuke the apanee badhaee dekar
jayamaala ke samay amit dev ke saath hee khada tha aur bajaay dev va veena kee jayamaala dekhane ke usane apanee nigaahen priya par tika rakhee theen
priya hansatee thee to amit ka saara shareer pulakit ho uthata tha
is samay usake hrday kee dhadakan badhee huee theen
pramod ne usakee chor nigaahon ko padh liya tha aur tabhee usake kaan mein bola tha aahista se  ab tum mujhase nahin bach sakate bachchoo mainne sab dekh liya hai
amit sakapaka gaya
lekin kuchh bola nahin
muskura bhar diya
jab jayamaala ke baad dev ko veena ke saath bheetar le jaaya gaya tab pramod amit kee baajoo pakade pandaal ke ek kone mein aakar baith gaya
saamane sangeet paartee ne sangeet kee dhun chhed rakhee thee
ab bolo tumhaaree kya salaah hai  pramod ne dheere se poochha amit se
meree  amit ne chaunkane ka abhinay kiya
vah man hee man muskura raha tha
khush tha apanee choree pakadee jaatee dekh kar
use lag raha tha ki pramod usaka raasta aasaan kar sakata hai
aur nahin to meree kya kar raha tha too main sab dekh raha tha  pramod usakee baajoo ko prem se marodate hue bola
mainne to kuchh nahin kiya
amit ne anjaan banane kee asaphal cheshta kee

kuchh nahin kiya kise dekh raha tha mujhase jhooth bolega to abhee phansa doonga dekh vah saamane khadee hai main abhee use apane paas bulaata hoon aur bol deta hoon ki tum usase kuchh kahana chaahate ho
amit ko laga jaise pramod jo kah raha hai vah karake dikha dega
ghabara gaya aur hathiyaar daalate hue bola  are nahin baaba aisa nahin karana
main to vaise hee dekh raha tha
tab pramod ne kaha  maan gae na mujhe ustaad
haan maan gaya
ab hukm deejie  aur tab amit ne bhee apane man kee har chaah ko khol kar rakh diya pramod ke saamane
hukm yahee hai ki ab is raaste se peechhe nahin hatana hai tumhen
jaise munh maangee muraad mil gaee amit ko pramod ke in shabdon se
aisa ab mumakin bhee to nahin
is raaste par aage hee badha ja sakata hai
peechhe hatane ka koee chaans nahin hain  amit ne usee lahaje mein javaab diya
bahut achchhee baat hai jitanee ho sakegee main bhee tumhaaree sahaayata karoonga
pramod ne use aashvast kiya
aao ab bheetar chalate hai sabake paas
chalie guroojee  ye donon ek doosare kee baanh mein baanh daale bheetar kee or badh gae
us samay sangeet paartee ka ek gaayak sangeet kee madhur dhun par ek geet ga raha tha jisake bol the
hamen tumase pyaar kitana ye ham nahin jaanate
magar jee nahin sakate tumhaare bina
amit ko ye bol apanee manodasha jaise lage
vah unhen hee gunagunaane laga
